headline: Is It Worth Investing in AppLovin (APP) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), AppLovin (APP) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: 2 of Wall Street’s Favorite Stocks with Solid Fundamentals and 1 to Think Twice About
summary: The stocks in this article have caught Wall Street’s attention in a big way, with price targets implying returns above 20%. But investors should take these forecasts with a grain of salt because analysts typically say nice things about companies so their firms can win business in other product lines like M&A advisory.
